title: M8.7 지진 - 1965 Western Aleutian Islands (Hawadax/Rat Islands) Earthquake
summary: 1965-02-04에 1965 Western Aleutian Islands (Hawadax/Rat Islands) Earthquake에서 발생한 규모 8.7의 대지진 (Great).
description:
## 지진 정보

**규모**: M8.7 (대지진 (Great))
**발생 시각**: 1965-02-04 05:01:22 UTC
**위치**: 1965 Western Aleutian Islands (Hawadax/Rat Islands) Earthquake
**깊이**: 30.3 km
**좌표**: 51.2510°N, 178.7150°E
